product_name: Swix HF5BW High-Fluoro Glide Wax - 7 to 18 Degrees F - 40g
long_description: Ideal for cold winter conditions, this easy-application wax with a lubricant additive excels on alpine slopes, cross-country trails and cold snow with dry friction conditions between 7 and 18F.
short_description: Ideal for cold winter conditions, this easy-application wax with a lubricant additive excels on alpine slopes, cross-country trails and cold snow with dry friction conditions between 7 and 18F.
